column1: Kjell Norwood Lindgren is a current NASA astronaut.
Lindgren was selected in June 2009 as a member of the NASA Astronaut Group 20.
He is scheduled to launch to the International Space Stationas part of Expedition 44 in June 2015.

column2: This article incorporatespublic domain material from websites or documents of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
